message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.NI

The paper discusses hebbian learning in neural networks, which falls under the category of computational neuroscience and machine learning. The paper proposes a new method for memory retrieval in the hebbian neural network, which involves identifying active sites in the network during the training phase. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE). Additionally, the paper discusses methods for improving the memory retrieval capacity of the network, which is a topic of interest in the sub-categories of Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also proposes a new approach for obtaining the update order of the network, which is relevant to the sub-category of Systems and Control (cs.SY) and Networked Systems (cs.NI).
